description: Its a hot, hot, HOT New York day. "..a day like today in Manhattan....anyone can be had," claims ERIK GRANT (on the phone with WILFRIED KNIGHT). He then proceeds to prove his point - when FREDRICK FORD shows up to deliver a package! Erik offers him a glass of water, then offers a lot more..... Plus theres a quick glimpse of ARPAD MIKLOS, Wilfrieds sexy-but-straight neighbor. What will the heat do to those two?
title: Erik Grant and Fredrick Ford
